item.title: RC Remote Software
item.description: I am done building my RC Remote and have started developing the software for both the comms library, as well as the remote itself.

item.title: Weather Station Part 2
item.description: I have started working on the main board for the station. Adding the transceiver, barometer, temperature, and humidity sensor.
